# node-plugin
bridge for C/C++ plugin for node

## install
npm install node-plugin

## test
npm test

## how to build
call c++/build.bat

more better way is to setup python, and then

```bash
pip install cam
cd  node-plugin
cam build
```
then all will be find in bin dir.
## template
将模版文件拷贝到指定目录dst_dir
npm run template dst_dir
